screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .rss file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
screenshot.caption: RSS file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code

description: Users can subscribe to RSS feeds to receive timely, up-to-the-minute news stories and blog entries. Web addresses that end in .rss will open as an RSS feed in web browsers that support RSS. For example, if you enter https://www.reddit.com/.rss in your web browser's address bar, you can view Reddit's RSS feed.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .rss file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
images.caption: RSS file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
